cause.description:
The Emannuel Wannamaker memorial foundation is helping me pay for the cost for the headstone for my infant son...this is a great foundation and for a great cause and any money collected would be donated with reference to the foundation and in Memory of my son Reid James McMurter. Thanks you for all who can help and for those who can't thank you for reading and caring.
www.reidjamesmcmurter.memory-of.com
1. That every baby should live
2. that Parents should never bury their children
3. that every angel baby should have a headstone
cause.mission: raise funds for the memorial headstone project
cause.name: SIDS Memorial headstone fundraiser
